name: Wizards + B*llshit - A Lawman Adventure
description:
A man in a wizard costume is Piiiiiiiiissed off - and is holding hostages in the depths of his sanctum of Wizardly Deliberations. You and your crew have the call. Do you have the might, magic and mettle to best him at his own game?

Wizards+B*llshit is a FREE RPG DAY 2021 adventure made specifically to have fun with the idea of playing the worst dungeon crawl ever designed, and has new characters, artwork, gear and a location for your Lawman setting.

The adventure is free, but a recommended donation to the dev team is here, in case you feel like supporting the effort.

Note:  The Lawman Corebook is required to play.
